titleStmt.title: A briefe discours of certain bathes or medicinall waters in the Countie of Warwicke neere vnto a village called Newnam Regis
titleStmt.author: Baley, Walter, 1529-1592.

notesStmt.note: Signed on A5 verso: Walter Bayly.
Running title reads: Of the bathes in Warwickshire.
Space left blank above dedication for a presentation inscription.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
